name: @iftt/tryte-encode-decode
description: Trytes are the encoded data type used by IOTA. This module encodes and decodes trytes.

scripts.lint+build+test: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.build: echo building... && babel src/ -d lib/ && echo 'successfully built'
scripts.test: echo running server tests... && tape test/**/*.js | tap-summary && echo 'successfully completed tests'

author: Craig OConnor
